text: Prince of Persia is the title of a series of video games and a movie that follow the adventures of a Persian Prince. They were created by Jordan Menchner. Prince of Persia has been developed and published by several different companies. Prince of Persia and Prince of Persia 2: The Shadow and the Flame, were developed by Brøderbund. Later Ubisoft took over creating the development starting with the series Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. The game platform has developed over the years from 2D animations to 3D worlds. The movie Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time was released by Disney in 2010. == Games == *Prince of Persia created by Brøderbund. *Prince of Persia 2: The Shadow and the Flame created by Brøderbund. *Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time created by Ubisoft. *Prince of Persia: Warrior Within created by Ubisoft. *Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones created by Ubisoft. *Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands created by Ubisoft. == References == Category:Parkour video games Category:Ubisoft games Category:Video game series Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Prince of Persia
